page.title: 06ENTERTAINMENT IN SHEFFIELD
page.content: There are a lot of places for leisure and entertainment around Sheffield. Some things happen once a year, e.g. the{Lord Mayor's Parade,}the{Sheffield {Star Marathon}and the{Sheffield Show. Some schools do activities once a year for example there's sports day, pantomimes or concerts. In the summer there are many leisure schemes for children around Sheffield in the parks, sports centres and museums. For adults there are twelve cinemas and also night-clubs like the Roxy. The{Crucible Theatre}has a tiered main theatre, a studio theatre and a bar and restaurant. There is a mobile section called{'Theatre {Vanguard'.}At the{City Hall}there are many concerts and a dance hall too. Many parks have facilities for old people who can play or spectate games of bowling and putting or even golf.
